General.Name: Eugene SPAC 1
General.Description: NANO Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells SCR DeNOx catalysts to remove nitrogen oxide and dioxin in Korea and internationally. The company provides honeycomb type, layered type, and plate type SCR catalysts. It offers its products for the use in thermal power plants, industrial boilers and plants, vessels, incinerators, chemical plants, engines, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Sangju-si, South Korea.

1.Name: D. Y. Yoon
1.Title: Head of Manufacturing and R&D Team
